Articles.Content:
Hello!

while i was trying to delete a old filthy save, i accidentally clicked and deleted my 2-month-old save...

Someone knows if i can recover it? i tried clicking older versions but nothing happened

Actually, the only thing i want are the .craft files, since it was a sandbox, i mostly had junk floating around (still, it was a lovely save!)
Is it in the recycling bin? If so then you can just put it back.

Is it in the recycling bin? If so then you can just put it back.

Nope D: im worried.

If that's the case, really all you can do is try to recover the deleted files.

The free version of this program should do the trick:

https://www.piriform.com/recuva

It's not a guaranteed solution, though. Files cannot always be recovered.
